formalpara.title: Internal help for this function in Asterisk 1.6:

para.screen:
-= Info about function 'VALID_EXTEN' =-
[Syntax] VALID_EXTEN([<context>],<extension>[,<priority>])
[Synopsis] Determine whether an extension exists or not
[Description] Returns a true value if the indicated context, extension, and priority exist. Context defaults to the current context, priority defaults to 1.

formalpara.title: Diff of the internal help from Asterisk 1.4 to 1.6:
